title: Lidded Crocus jar
provenance_text:
Mrs. Howard A. (Katherine Babcock) Noble [c.1880-1954], Pittsburgh, PA by July 1953 until 1954 [1]; life estate to her husband, Howard A. Noble [1874-1964], Pittsburgh PA, 1954 until April 30, 1964 [2]; Katherine B. Noble bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1964.

Notes:
[1]. The pair of lidded crocus jars, 64.12.1.A-B and 64.12.2.A-B, is included in a codicil of Mrs. Noble's will dated July 28, 1953 (see copy in donor files.)
[2]. The crocus jar and its companion were delivered to the museum in May 1964.
